description: Marina is a known spirit cooker. I’ll explain more about spirit cooking in next post. Bill Gates advocates vaccines and some sort of permanent mark on your body that would signify health. Mark of the beast, anyone? #mymaria777 From the Microsoft article, “Arguably the world’s most acclaimed performance artist, Marina Abramović explores the medium of mixed reality for the first time with ‘The Life.’ Brought to life with the HoloLens 2, the 19-minute performance follows Abramović, whose phantom-like virtual image appears in a vibrant red dress as she explores the space and its borders. Viewers become mesmerized by her mindful movements, her virtual image dissolving as she interacts with the installation’s borders.”
